channel.title: DevHawk tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from DevHawk.

item.description: Today's Workout :335# squat, 125# overhead press, 375# deadlift. 5x5 worksets (3x5 deadlift worksets) #StrongLifts5x5
item.source:markdown: Today's Workout :335# squat, 125# overhead press, 375# deadlift. 5x5 worksets (3x5 deadlift worksets) #StrongLifts5x5

item.description:
Just pushed out a minor update to the @Neo_Blockchain tookit.

Neo-Express v3.3.27 enables the new RpcServer Traverse Iterators feature by default. This feature enables JSON-RPC clients to fully enumerate iterators returned from contract operations

https://t.co/6UDf855SUv

If you want to see Traverse Iterators in action, the Neo Contributor NFT sample client application has been updated to use them to enumerate the available NFTs.

https://t.co/PFB3vo9awu

Neo-Express 3.3.27 also fixes a couple of issues with command line processing for the new contract download command. These fixes make contract download a little easier to execute and makes the argument usage consistent between direct and batch mode.
item.source:markdown:
Just pushed out a minor update to the @Neo_Blockchain tookit.
Neo-Express v3.3.27 enables the new RpcServer Traverse Iterators feature by default. This feature enables JSON-RPC clients to fully enumerate iterators returned from contract operations
https://t.co/6UDf855SUv
If you want to see Traverse Iterators in action, the Neo Contributor NFT sample client application has been updated to use them to enumerate the available NFTs.
https://t.co/PFB3vo9awu
Neo-Express 3.3.27 also fixes a couple of issues with command line processing for the new contract download command. These fixes make contract download a little easier to execute and makes the argument usage consistent between direct and batch mode.

item.description:
Minor @Neo_Blockchain tool news: Neo 3.3.1 compatible version of my DumpNEF tool is now available. Minor update to generated comments + Neo version bump

https://t.co/wTChpq5q8d
item.source:markdown:
Minor @Neo_Blockchain tool news: Neo 3.3.1 compatible version of my DumpNEF tool is now available. Minor update to generated comments + Neo version bump
https://t.co/wTChpq5q8d

item.description:
We just shipped the latest #NeoBlockchainToolkit for @Neo_Blockchain v3.3.1 last week. Unfortunately, we had to update the Neo.BuildTasks package to address a Neo C# compiler issue.

https://t.co/Od0nMhPy2L

Neo.BuildTasks v3.3.23 addresses the issue, fixes a couple bugs, adds new tests and adds a new ContractNameOverride attribute to give developers more control over the generated test code.

https://t.co/maszyFKvJ3

There's also a new doc that describes the various MSBuild properties and items that Neo.BuildTasks uses and provides guidance for upgrading your v3.1 project to v3.3 (mostly removing stuff that's no longer needed)

https://t.co/5WrvYbypLS
item.source:markdown:
We just shipped the latest #NeoBlockchainToolkit for @Neo_Blockchain v3.3.1 last week. Unfortunately, we had to update the Neo.BuildTasks package to address a Neo C# compiler issue.
https://t.co/Od0nMhPy2L
Neo.BuildTasks v3.3.23 addresses the issue, fixes a couple bugs, adds new tests and adds a new ContractNameOverride attribute to give developers more control over the generated test code.
https://t.co/maszyFKvJ3
There's also a new doc that describes the various MSBuild properties and items that Neo.BuildTasks uses and provides guidance for upgrading your v3.1 project to v3.3 (mostly removing stuff that's no longer needed)
https://t.co/5WrvYbypLS

item.description:
@patrickallmond I did 330# squat Tuesday last week, but tweaked my neck. I cycled back to 315# for Friday and 325# on Sunday before taking another run at 330# today. Felt good.

360# deadlift felt significantly less good. I spilled water in my gym bag and my wrist straps were wet. Threw me off.
item.source:markdown:
@patrickallmond I did 330# squat Tuesday last week, but tweaked my neck. I cycled back to 315# for Friday and 325# on Sunday before taking another run at 330# today. Felt good.
360# deadlift felt significantly less good. I spilled water in my gym bag and my wrist straps were wet. Threw me off.
